Class ContactsApp

java.lang.Object
ContactsApp
public class ContactsApp extends Object
The class ContactsApp contains methods relating to storing, accessing and editing contact information

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addNewContact()
    method used for adding a new contact with mandatory details (id, first name, last name, phone number) and optional details (email and address)

    method used for choosing a contact, user inputs id and method seeks it from exsisting data

    method used for deleting a contact, if no match prints out no target found

    method used for synchronizing text file data to arraylist

    main method runs methods to synch up information, present main menu and take user's initial feed to use the application. if no text file exists one is created

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      main method runs methods to synch up information, present main menu and take user's initial feed to use the application. if no text file exists one is created
      Parameters:
      args - default parameter for main method

      public static void printMainMenu()
      printMainMenu prints out choices user has to use the application

      printContactBookMenu prints out choices to quit or return to main menu

      prints out choices to quit or return to main menu

    • userInputMenu

      public static int userInputMenu()
      receives and validates user's input to use mainMenu/contactBookMenu choices.
      Returns:
      int returns userChoice

    • userChoice

      public static void userChoice(int command)
      switch-case operating via int, runs method based on received feed
      Parameters:
      command - is int received from userInputMenu (0-5)

    • choosingContact

      public static int choosingContact()
      method used for choosing a contact, user inputs id and method seeks it from exsisting data
      Returns:
      returns -5 if contact's not found otherwise returns target's index

    • deleteContact

      public static void deleteContact(int index)
      method used for deleting a contact, if no match prints out no target found
      Parameters:
      index - is int used to identify chosen contact

    • editContact

      public static void editContact(int index)
      method used for editing a contact, if no match prints out no target found
      Parameters:
      index - is int used to identify chosen contact

      method used for adding a new contact with mandatory details (id, first name, last name, phone number) and optional details (email and address)
